languages.text: "В жизни есть вещи, не знать и не думать о которых — дар Великого. В моей жизни только что стало на одну такую вещь меньше".
"There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."
languages.original_text: "В жизни есть вещи, не знать и не думать о которых — дар Великого. В моей жизни только что стало на одну такую вещь меньше".

traits.locale_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."
"There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."
"There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."
"There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

languages.text: “人生有些事情，最好不要知道，也不要多想。不知道这些事情，便是来自至高无上的神皇的祝福。这么说吧，呃，我感觉我有点不像以前那么受到祝福了。”
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: “人生有些事情，最好不要知道，也不要多想。不知道这些事情，便是来自至高无上的神皇的祝福。这么说吧，呃，我感觉我有点不像以前那么受到祝福了。”

languages.text: «Hay cosas en la vida que es mejor no saber y en las que es mejor no pensar. La ignorancia es una bendición del Exaltado. Pues ahora mismo agradecería haber sido bendecida con respecto a esto».
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: «Hay cosas en la vida que es mejor no saber y en las que es mejor no pensar. La ignorancia es una bendición del Exaltado. Pues ahora mismo agradecería haber sido bendecida con respecto a esto».

languages.text: 「人生には、知らなくていいことや考えなくていいことがある…無知はエグザルテッド・ワンからの祝福だよ。まぁ、今はその祝福をあまり感じないけどね」
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: 「人生には、知らなくていいことや考えなくていいことがある…無知はエグザルテッド・ワンからの祝福だよ。まぁ、今はその祝福をあまり感じないけどね」

languages.text: "Von manchen Dingen des Lebens weiß man besser nichts oder denkt nicht daran – Unwissenheit ist ein Segen des Erhabenen. Und im Moment fühle ich mich etwas weniger gesegnet."
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Von manchen Dingen des Lebens weiß man besser nichts oder denkt nicht daran – Unwissenheit ist ein Segen des Erhabenen. Und im Moment fühle ich mich etwas weniger gesegnet."

languages.text: « Dans la vie, il y a des choses qu'il vaut mieux ne pas savoir, ou auxquelles on préfère ne pas penser... Leur ignorance est une bénédiction de l'Exalté. Eh bien disons que là tout de suite, je me sens pas tellement bénie. »
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la vie, il y a des choses qu'il vaut mieux ne pas savoir, ou auxquelles on préfère ne pas penser... Leur ignorance est une bénédiction de l'Exalté. Eh bien disons que là tout de suite, je me sens pas tellement bénie. »

languages.text: "Hayatta bilmemenin, üzerine düşünmemenin daha iyi olduğu bazı şeyler vardır. İşte bunları bilmemek, Görkemli'nin bir lütfudur. Şu ara pek kutsanmış hissetmiyorum ya, neyse."
languages.original_text: "There are some things in life that you're better off not knowing or thinking about — ignorance of them is a blessing from the Exalted One. Well, right now, I'm feeling a little less blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatta bilmemek veya düşünmemenin daha iyi olduğu bazı şeyler vardır. İşte bunları bilmemek Görkemli'nin bir lütfudur. Şu ara pek kutsanmış hissetmiyorum ya, neyse."
